definition: A device that performs various tasks by executing a set of instructions, typically used for processing and storing information, performing calculations, and facilitating communication and data manipulation. It is commonly utilized for tasks such as word processing, internet browsing, gaming, and data analysis.

examples.english: I use my computer for work.
The computer screen is too bright.
